DataFileName.description: Name of the file to be copied. You can use pattern match characters eg. *. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/connector-azure-blob-storage?tabs=data-factory#blob-storage-as-a-source-type

options.infoText: Name of the file to be copied. You can use pattern match characters eg. *. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/connector-azure-blob-storage?tabs=data-factory#blob-storage-as-a-source-type
Set to true if you want the framework to remove the source file after a successsful copy.
The upper limit of concurrent connections established to the data store during the activity run. Specify a value only when you want to limit concurrent connections
Set to true if you want the framework to copy files from subfolders.

RelativePath.description: Path of the file to be copied. You can use pattern match characters eg. *. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/connector-azure-blob-storage?tabs=data-factory#blob-storage-as-a-source-type
